Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Can perform Reversible Exchange with Super Saiyan 2 Caulifla
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Guards all attacks
*When attacking for the 1st time within the turn*
- Performs a critical hit
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki*
- ATK 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 66%{passiveImg:up_g} for every Ki
*6 or more Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches 2 additional Super Attacks
*23 Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches 2 additional Super Attacks

7598.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy and 
raises chance of performing a critical hit & 
chance of evading enemy's attack 
(including Super Attack) by 6% for 1 turn

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7599.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and raises chance of performing 
a critical hit by 26% for 3 turns

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Kale Goes Berserk!
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
Ki +6 and ATK +40% in battle
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated upon entering 
attacking turn (once only, be it 
before or after Reversible Exchange)
